New Records: Denver Nuggets defeated Los Angeles Clippers 126-103, setting a new largest victory margin for the season
Key Match Events: Denver Nuggets won by a margin of 23 points
Los Angeles Clippers struggled from the field with a 36% shooting percentage
Pre-Game Insights: Denver Nuggets were playing on their home court
Home-court advantage was a factor in the Nuggets' performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the latest head-to-head meeting between the Denver Nuggets and Los Angeles Clippers
